item.title: directors
item.dc:creator: Godfrey
item.content:encoded: Redeemer High School is a Christian-based secondary school in Uganda offering quality O-Level and A-Level education with strong academic performance and discipline. Fabio IbrahimHead Teacher Redeemer High School is one of the leading secondary schools in Uganda providing quality education at both O-Level and A-Level. We emphasize academic excellence, discipline, Christian values, and holistic student development. Our qualified teachers, modern facilities, and supportive environment prepare learners for UNEB success and future careers. Tindyebwa MaliseriSchool Administrator Redeemer High School is a leading Christian-based secondary school in Bundibugyo District, offering quality O-Level and A-Level education. We nurture disciplined, confident, and academically excellent learners prepared for UNEB success and future leadership. Pastor Bamwetirebye VaninsioSchool Director Redeemer High School is committed to providing holistic education that combines academic excellence, moral discipline, and spiritual growth. Our experienced teachers and supportive environment help learners achieve their full potential.. Rev Kyomuhendo GeoffreySecond School Director

item.title: home now
item.dc:creator: Godfrey
item.content:encoded:
Welcome To Redeemer High School Qualified and experienced teachers Strong academic performance Christian foundation Safe and supportive environment Modern learning facilities Cocurricular & talent development

At Redeemer High School, we are committed to nurturing confident, responsible, and God-fearing learners equipped with the knowledge and skills needed to excel in a rapidly changing world.
Our dedicated teachers, modern learning facilities, and strong academic programs ensure that every learner reaches their full potential.

item.title: slide show
item.dc:creator: Godfrey
item.content:encoded:
Our Philosophy

We believe that every child can excel when given the right guidance, support, and opportunities. Our approach focuses on both academic achievement and value-based education.

Admissions at Redeemer High School

Redeemer High School welcomes students who are committed to academic excellence, discipline, and positive values. Our admissions process is transparent, fair, and supportive. Find More

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: Godfrey
item.content:encoded:
Welcome To Redeemer High School Qualified and experienced teachers Strong academic performance Christian foundation Safe and supportive environment Modern learning facilities Cocurricular & talent development

At Redeemer High School, we are committed to nurturing confident, responsible, and God-fearing learners equipped with the knowledge and skills needed to excel in a rapidly changing world.
Our dedicated teachers, modern learning facilities, and strong academic programs ensure that every learner reaches their full potential.

Our Mission

To provide holistic education that empowers students academically, spiritually, socially, and morally.

Our Vision

To be a leading center of excellence producing disciplined, innovative, and globally competitive learners.

Core Values

  • Discipline
  • Faith
  • Integrity
  • Excellence
  • Teamwork
  • Respect
Male 0 Female 0 Total Number Of Students 0

Sports

Learn More

Academics

Learn More

Cultural Gala

Learn More Redeemer High School is a Christian-based secondary school in Uganda offering quality O-Level and A-Level education with strong academic performance and discipline. Fabio IbrahimHead Teacher Redeemer High School is one of the leading secondary schools in Uganda providing quality education at both O-Level and A-Level. We emphasize academic excellence, discipline, Christian values, and holistic student development. Our qualified teachers, modern facilities, and supportive environment prepare learners for UNEB success and future careers. Tindyebwa MaliseriSchool Administrator Redeemer High School is a leading Christian-based secondary school in Bundibugyo District, offering quality O-Level and A-Level education. We nurture disciplined, confident, and academically excellent learners prepared for UNEB success and future leadership. Pastor Bamwetirebye VaninsioSchool Director Redeemer High School is committed to providing holistic education that combines academic excellence, moral discipline, and spiritual growth. Our experienced teachers and supportive environment help learners achieve their full potential.. Rev Kyomuhendo GeoffreySecond School Director

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: Godfrey
item.content:encoded:
Why Join Redeemer High School

Strong academic results Christian values and discipline Qualified and caring teachers Safe and supportive environment Talent development programs

Who We Are

Redeemer High School is a reputable secondary school committed to excellence in academics, character formation, and spiritual growth. Since its establishment, the school has consistently produced disciplined and high-performing learners who excel both in national examinations and in life.

Our History

Founded with the purpose of providing quality education to the community, Redeemer High School has grown into one of the regions most respected institutions. Over the years, we have expanded our facilities, enhanced our academic programs, and strengthened our commitment to nurturing well-rounded learners

School Facilities

Redeemer High School provides a conducive and well-equipped environment for learning:
Spacious and well-lit classrooms, Fully equipped science laboratories (Biology, Chemistry & Physics), Computer laboratory with internet access, Well-stocked library, Sports grounds (football, basketball, netball, volleyball), Chapel for worship and spiritual guidance, Safe boarding facilities and Reliable water and electricity supply

Spiritual Life

As a Christian-based institution, spiritual growth is central to our school life. Students participate in:

Weekly chapel services,

Scripture Union fellowships,

Bible study sessions,

Counseling and mentorship programs

Our Staff

Our team consists of experienced and passionate teachers who create a supportive and engaging learning environment. We work closely with parents and guardians to ensure a strong partnership in each learners success.
